scripts.postinstall: npm run bootstrap && npm run compile
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci:build && npm run test:ci:unit && npm run test:ci:integration
scripts.test:ci:unit: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --entrypoint 'npm run test:unit' test_runner
scripts.test:ci:integration: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --entrypoint 'npm run test:integration' test_runner
